publisher.value: Health and Social Care Information Centre

description.value: A vocabulary that identifies the reason for withdrawal.

requirements.value: To allow the reason for withdrawal to be indicated to the receiver of the withdral notice.

display.value: Patient is safe to discharge without a needs assessment
Patient is eligible for NHS Continuing Health Care
Patient's proposed treatment has been cancelled or postponed
Patient has refused a needs assessment
Patient is resident in another local authority
Patient has transferred to intermediate care
Patient is making their own arrangements
